subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Plushenko, an Olympic gold and silver medalist, is not eligible for the 2014 Winter Olympics, after failing to appeal the International Skating Union’s decision to strip him of eligibility.
snippet: Evgeni Plushenko, an Olympic gold and silver medalist, is not eligible for the 2014 Winter Olympics, after failing to appeal the International Skating Union’s decision to strip him of eligibility.
